sentence.text: We investigated plasma microRNA (miRNA) profiles associated with variation of hyperglycemia, measured as hemoglobin A1c (HbA1c), in two panels of patients with type 1 diabetes (T1D).
Dysregulation of these miRNAs, which are associated with hyperglycemia in patients with T1D, may contribute to the development of diabetes complications.
In conclusion, our study identified four circulating miRNAs that were influenced by variation in hyperglycemia.
